::WindRider::
"Battera", he says, "when that moment comes, I will do
everything I can to help your cause." He offers her
his hand.
(OOC: This will be my last post for a couple of hours)
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She lowers her head. "There is nothing to be done
> for the moment. It 
> will happen soon.  But we must wait for the moment."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > WindRider stands up. He looks into Battera's
> optics.
> > "Well",he says, "now there's one more. No one
> seems to
> > realize just what's at stake in this war. No
> matter
> > who wins this war, everybody loses. We've got to
> stop
> > this war, and I want to help you do it."
